tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Found the doctor very lazy to answer questions and also not very interested. Not at all comforting as I took my newborn. Also he prescribed medication for newborn which made my daughter all the more uncomfortable.

Will not recommend this doctor.

Doctor just spent 30 seconds with patient and quick to recommend another doctor for surgery. That means you Keep on paying consulting fees to each doctor they keep on referring within Aster Hospital premises. ****** ***** *** **** ******* ******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very disappointed with the experience, no clear explanation of the issue. Was in very hurry , asked to buy medicine only from hospital ***** ****** ** * *** ***** **** ***** *** **** **** ***** ** ** **** *** *** *****
